articles.title: Scotland: Nathan Patterson and Anthony Ralston included in squad for World Cup play-off semi-final - Sky Sports
articles.description: Nathan Patterson and Anthony Ralston have been included in Steve Clarke's Scotland squad for the World Cup play-off semi-finals and upcoming Nations League matches.
articles.content:
